attributes.action: Stop allowing MP's to resign over major breaches of public trust - Take action and Sack them with immeadiate effect. No juicey payouts, no seat in the House of Lords, just SACKED!  Treat them in the manner any member of the British public would be treated by an employer for fraud!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
MP's are proving that they believe themselves to be better than the public to whom they are pledged to serve.  You have no right to remain in post until a fat pay out can be awarded, you must be sacked and disgraced as the rest of the nation would surely be in this situation.
Remember that those in government are there to serve the public interest, not their own.  Prove you want to fight this corruption and sack all involved with immeadiate effect.

Mr Brown please live up the title of "Right Honourable" and do what is right by your people.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
